page.title: 05RESIDENTIAL CARAVAN SITE.
page.content: We have lived in a caravan nearly a year.In the summer we had no Electri- city.Then we moved into one that we rented for Â£25 a week,the water still didn't run but there was a tap outside The fire wasn't giving off much heat so we moved into a residential caravan that had electricity,water,and radiat- ors.This was about Â£200 a month but was too much so we moved back into our first one.We do not have a toilet so we use the public ones.Someone put a rat down the ladies toilet.There are two sets of swings,two yellow,and two peppermint coloured ones.There is also a climbing frame and a roundabout in the shape of a witch's hat.There is a shop open in the summer.Next door to the caravan there is a farm,there are hens,peacocks,cows,bulls,and goats. We are moving into a new house soon. Clare Mcquilling age 9.
